path.style: fill: none; stroke: #231f20; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 4px;

polyline.style: fill: none; stroke: #231f20; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 4px;

path.style: fill: none; stroke: #231f20; stroke-dasharray: 1 6; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 4px;
